item.title: Liftoff Static Site With GitHub Actions
item.description: Create site 1. Install hugo on local machine Download Ubuntu package from: https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases $ sudo dpkg -i hugo_0.87.0_Linux-64bit.deb More installing options: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ 2 Generate new Hugo site $ hugo new site <GITHUB-USERNAME>.github.io # Rename to source directory the same name the repo to create on GitHub $ mv <GITHUB-USERNAME>.github.io <GITHUB-USERNAME>.github.io.source 3. Add Hugo template $ cd <GITHUB-USERNAME>.github.io.source $ git submodule add https://github.

item.title: Big Bang
item.description: From : Krogg ____________________________________________________________ /In the begining there wasnt much. | | Then bang,shit started flying out from a tiny point in an explosion |that few have *really* pondered the power of. | A | \ | / | \|/ | <------.------> | /|\ | / | \ | V |gazillions and gazilions of subatomic particles in a highenergy plasma |floodded outward and began to cool.Hydrogen began to form in this soup |of protons,neutrons,electrons and stuff | | .
